questions.question_text: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?

section_groups.instructions: Answer each question briefly and clearly in one to three sentences. Use complete sentences and provide key details to support your answer.

questions.question_text: Who is known as the “Father of Computers”?

section_groups.instructions: Read each statement carefully. Choose “True” if the statement is correct, and “False” if it is not.

questions.question_text: The Sun is the largest planet in our solar system.

section_groups.instructions: Complete each sentence by filling in the blank with the correct word or phrase.

questions.question_text: The process by which plants make their own food is called __________.
The largest ocean on Earth is the __________ Ocean.

section_groups.instructions: Answer each question in 5–8 sentences. Explain your ideas clearly, include examples where possible, and write in complete sentences.

questions.question_text: Explain the importance of the water cycle and describe its main stages.
Discuss the impact of technology on modern education.

section_groups.instructions: Answer any one of the following. Each question carries equal marks.

questions.question_text: Explain how respiration differs from photosynthesis.

section_groups.instructions: Read the following passage carefully and then answer the questions that follow. Write your answers in complete sentences.

questions.question_text: Why are trees important for life on Earth?
How do trees help to keep the environment clean?
What will happen if we continue to cut down trees?
